lead_paragraph: Seven executives joined the board of the Advertising Club of New York. They are: Dawn Bullen, senior vice president for media at Macy’s; Marnie Kain Cocossa, executive vice president and global equity director at Saatchi & Saatchi, part of the Publicis Groupe; Colleen De Courcy, chief digital officer, TBWA Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group; Rachel Goldflam, marketing manager for Burberry, who is the young professional president for the club; Todd Harvey, director for North American advertising, Citigroup; Mari Kim Novak, director for United States marketing at the advertising division of Microsoft; and Robin Steinberg, senior vice president and director for print, MediaVest USA, part of the Starcom MediaVest Group division of Publicis.
